newsitem.title: PANAMA: Panama stock exchange volume up 44 pct vs yr ago.
newsitem.headline: Panama stock exchange volume up 44 pct vs yr ago.

text.p: Trading volume on Panama's stock market rose 44.36 percent from January to August compared with the same period in 1995, an exchange spokeswoman said Wednesday.
The 11-share stock exchange traded $190.403 million from Jan 1 to Aug 30, up from $131.892 million during the same period in 1995.
The jump is reflected in bolsa-listed companies making larger volume listings of short-term commercial paper, the spokeswoman said.
